#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int n,t,f;
int main()
{
      scanf("%d",&t);
      while(t--)
      {
          scanf("%d%d",&n,&f);
          if(n==1)
          printf("1\n");
          else if(f==2)
          printf("-1\n");
          else
          printf("%d\n",3*n/2);
      }
        return 0;
}
